scripts.sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.ios: npm run sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.ios:run: npm run sync && npx cap run ios
scripts.ios:build: npm run sync && xcodebuild -workspace ios/App/App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release
scripts.android: npm run sync && npx cap open android
scripts.android:run: npm run sync && npx cap run android
scripts.setup: npm install && npx cap add ios && npm run sync
